title: How to use/create eraser for finger print on bitpmap?
body:
Hello,

I use "FingerPaintSavePage" to try to create an eraser for my finger painting.
I loaded a bitmap with: 

`this.saveBitmap = BitmapExtensions.LoadBitmapResource(this.GetType(), "SkiaSharpFormsDemos.Media.MonkeyFace.png");`

And now, I can draw on this little monkey.

I found this post where "mario.mora" said: "You have to set transparent color and blendmode as "Src", shomehow like this:"
But when I do that, I can erase my bitmap behind (it's render like a white paint)...

How can I do an eraser?

Thanks
